item.title: Need help with p.rights command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Horrible indentation.

if(cmd[0].equals("staffzone"))
{
    if(p.playerRights > 0)
    {
        p.teleportTo(2855, 3677, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
        p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Teleported to The <img=1>Admin And <img=0>Mods Staff Zone");
    }
    else
    {
        p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You must be a moderator or administrator to use this command.");
    }
}

There, cleaned it up too.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with p.rights command
item.dc:creator: @Devildreams54 Devildreams54
item.description:
@Devildreams54 wrote:

Im new to the 508 servers Started Today

I Wont to have a staff zone and i made this command.

else if(cmd[0].equals("staffzone")) { p.teleportTo(2855, 3677, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Teleported to The Admin And Mods Staff Zone"); }

But wont to so only admins and mods can do there.

I now its very simple but i cant get it becuase im new.

Thanks devildreams.
